violations.excerpt: name does not meet format requirements

discussion.author: Beforerr
discussion.text:
[noblock]
Since this package is a Julia-based alternative/successor to SPEDAS (IDL-based) and PySPEDAS (Python-based), sticking to the name SPEDAS may be a good idea to keep the name consistent.

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text: I think the name is okay, but you’ll have to ask on Slack for a manual merge after the three-day waiting period ends

discussion.author: brenhinkeller
discussion.text: [noblock] @goerz if you edit your comment to noblock it may automerge since Gunnar added the "name similarity is OK" tag?

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text:
No, that’s not going to do it. Unfortunately, the name-similarity-ok tag doesn’t override the all-caps rule. It would be nice if there was an override tag for that as well that I could apply, but for now there isn’t. You really do need a manual merge from a full registry maintainer. All you can do is to keep pinging the Slack channel at regular intervals. Sorry about that: I understand the process is not ideal.

[noblock]
